Control Name: Approves System Changes—A process is in place to approve system changes prior to implementation.

control_attributes.Control: Approves System Changes—A process is in place to approve system changes prior to implementation.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC8.1 The entity authorizes, designs, develops or acquires, configures, documents, tests, approves, and implements changes to infrastructure, data, software, and procedures to meet its objectives.
